lines.text: create new string variable aset = " qwertyuiopasdfghjkl ; zxcvbnm , . / "
read variable ch from the input
read variable mole from the input
create new integer variable lim with value = length of aset
create integer variable with name lim2 = length of mole
for i = 0 to lim2 exclusive incrementing i
if mole [ i ] is equal to ' q ' , ' a ' or ' z '
lines.code: if ( mole [ i ] == ' q ' || mole [ i ] == ' a ' || mole [ i ] == ' z ' )

lines.text: print mole [ i ] to the standard output
if mole [ i ] is equal to aset [ j ] , print aset [ j - 1 ] to the output
lines.code: if ( mole [ i ] == aset [ j ] ) { cout << aset [ j - 1 ] ; }

lines.text: in a for loop , change i from 0 to lim2 exclusive incrementing i
